page.title: 05Industries in SW Fairford
page.content: {Remtek International}employs 9 people. They make Heat Shrinkable products and Tubes that go over wires. They have been open for 6 years. {New Chapel Electronics}has been open for 8 years since moving to Fairford from Meysey Hampton. Electronic Material is made,employing 35 people { Simplas}employs 9 people,making UPVC windows and doors. { Wigfalls}employs 14 people making fruit machines and video recording machines.It has been open for 3 years. { SML}in Swindon, employs 4 people.They manufacture metal fire escapes and escape hatches. { Scene One}employs 7 people making furniture such as coffee tables, chairs,tables and desks.
